alert.note: Alert for Harding; Mora; San Miguel (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 07 at 6:41PM MDT until June 07 at 7:15PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albuquerque has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central San Miguel County in northeastern New Mexico... Northwestern Harding County in northeastern New Mexico... East central Mora County in northeastern New Mexico... * Until 715 PM MDT. * At 640 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Roy, or 22 miles northwest of Mosquero, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Roy. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
